attributes.action: Allow State Pensioners to travel free before 0900hrs
attributes.additional_details: To allow the older generations, millions of whom are suffering with failing health coupled with mobility and confidence issues to travel free prior to 0900hrs. These people need to attend hospital appointments before 0900hrs and shop for groceries when there are less people around. One journey a day robs meagre pensions payments of approximately £50 a month. £50 is alot to lose on freedom to travel.
attributes.background: Push TFL and local councils to lift the ban on free travel for State Pensioners before 0900hrs.

rejection.details:
The issues raised by this petition are a matter for local authorities.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
